name: WePiggy Coin
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
What Is WePiggy?
WePiggy is an open source, non-custodial crypto asset lending market protocol. In Wepiggy’s market, users can deposit their crypto assets to earn interest, or borrow others by paying interests.

WePiggy Coin
WePiggy Coin (WPC) is the governance token of WePiggy protocol, with a total amount of about 8 billion, which is completely generated through mining, no VC allocation, no private sale, no pre-mining.
